member.name: M:ASC.Mail.Aggregator.CollectionService.AggregatorService.OnStart(System.String[])
member.summary: OnStart(): Put startup code here - Start threads, get inital data, etc.

member.name: M:ASC.Mail.Aggregator.CollectionService.AggregatorService.OnStop
member.summary: OnStop(): Put your stop code here - Stop threads, set final data, etc.

member.name: M:ASC.Mail.Aggregator.CollectionService.AggregatorService.OnShutdown
member.summary: OnShutdown(): Called when the System is shutting down - Put code here when you need special handling of code that deals with a system shutdown, such as saving special data before shutdown.

member.name: M:ASC.Mail.Aggregator.CollectionService.AggregatorService.OnPowerEvent(System.ServiceProcess.PowerBroadcastStatus)
member.summary: OnPowerEvent(): Useful for detecting power status changes, such as going into Suspend mode or Low Battery for laptops.
member.param: The Power Broadcast Status (BatteryLow, Suspend, etc.)
